entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test plan for "method group natural type improvements" #69432
    17.9

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34008.209 #69433
  • Recursive type triggers Roslyn stack overflow and crashes Visual Studio #68223
    17.8
  • The default language version for `net8.0` needs to be 12.0 #69109
    17.8
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34007.311 #69428
  • EnC: Inline Arrays #69245
  • Rude edits not detected when changing (primary) constructor initializer #68731

PullRequests

Created

  • Expose fix all for refactorings as an experimental public API #69430
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Add analyzer/fixer to recommend updating stackalloc expressions to use collection expressions. #69414
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add LSP Simplify Method for Razor #69323
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Fix constraint cycle through nested type of base type #69242
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Adjust OptProf config #69370
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Record lambda optional parameters in C# 12 #69431
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Add LanguageVersion for C# 12 #69383
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Add LanguageName to telemetry information passed in for CodeRefactoring_Delay and CodeFix_Delay telemetry calls #69350
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add an LSP notification for loading projects #69427
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Do not use cached CompilationWithAnalyzers which don't contain all an… #69419
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Enable tests for #68731 #69193
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Add server->client notification to show project load failures #69424
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Workaround issues with Uri escaping certain Unicode characters #69304
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Fix analyzer conflicts on Linux #69406
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add effective severities custom property array to error log #68892
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add support for assembly/module-level `[Experimental]` and contextual suppression #69316
    Area-Compilers, 17.8
  • Add fuzzer for incremental generators #68903
    Area-Compilers, Test, 17.8
  • Support converting arrays, whose elements are assigned afterwards, to a collection expression. #69415
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: use inline arrays for collection expressions with span target types #69412
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • SyntaxGenerator handle explicit interface indexer #69285
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Recommend 'using static' before a top-level statement #69346
    Area-IDE
  • Look scope by scope for method group natural type #69158
    Area-Compilers, 17.9
  • Method group natural type: only use methods that can be fully substituted and pass constraint checks #69226
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, untriaged, 17.9
  • Collection expressions: emit Array.Empty<T>() for [] with target type T[] or IEnumerable<T> #69355
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix issues where internal pattern matching state was being copied #69336
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve EOL consistency for Add Using #69309
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Verify synthesized `RequiresLocationAttribute` cannot be accessed by fnptrs #69328
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • A better descriptor Id for an F# analyzer #69313
    Area-Analyzers, Community, untriaged
  • Unify `ref readonly` with `in` parameter behavior where it currently differs #69235
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, 17.8
  • Improve detection of receiver cloning in ref safety analysis #67736
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, 17.8
  • Implementation for Regex QuickInfo Provider and it includes documentation for Regular Expressions. #69405
    Area-IDE, Community
